# Mapping

```{r}
library(sf)
library(raster)
library(spData)
library(tmap)
#library(spDataLarge)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r}
individual %<>%
  filter(!is.na(decimalLongitude), !is.na(decimalLatitude)) %>%
  sf::st_as_sf(coords = c("decimalLongitude", "decimalLatitude"), 
                       crs = 4326)
```
